name: Rust
postCreateCommand: sudo curl -s --compressed -o /usr/share/keyrings/ctr-pubkey.gpg "https://deb.ctr-electronics.com/ctr-pubkey.gpg" && sudo curl -s --compressed -o /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ctr2024.list "https://deb.ctr-electronics.com/ctr2024.list" && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y clang libfmt-dev phoenix6
